title: BUFFS FOR CHAMPS THAT ARE NOT PLAYED
body: Riot, please understand that everyone in the world has there own favorite champion that is unique to them. But there are champions which has more of a popularity to them. And there are called OP or BROKEN champions. Just Hear me that it would make the world and people REALLY HAPPY if you were to BUFF champions that are not played anymore.

Darius is 17/53 in terms of play rate for top champs. What does, "not played" mean to you?

Not all underplayed champions are underpowered (thats not to say some underpowered champions don't exist)

There are plenty of champions who are quite good, and simply underplayed such as {{champion:90}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:85}} etc ({{champion:101}} was an example as well before his rework, absurdly low pick rate; absurdly strong kit / damage wise; he's still great, has a higher pick rate though).
Malz has a decent pick rate though.

Buffing underplayed champs just because they're underplayed it how you have really OP champs 2 months later. Hi Sejuani!
pentakill mordekaiser!  XD  hi Swain...did my hp bar just disappear?  yes, yes it did XD

Certain champs aren't played often either because they're unfriendly to a less-communicative group of solo queuers, or because they fit a specific niche in a less conventional team comp. Doesn't necessarily mean they're bad.

{{champion:43}}  is my favourite champion and I dont see anyone play her ever. Underrated, if anything.
